title.rendered: Free $10 Gift Card + Shane Gottwals Video + Mural

content.rendered:
Free $10 Gift Card

Give the gift of reading! From now through Christmas Eve, receive a FREE $10 gift card for every $25 gift card you buy. Gift cards redeemable after 12/25/2016; limit of 10 free cards.

 

Judge us by our cover!

Check out this fantastic article written by Telegraph writer Ed Grisamore about the Gottwals Books Macon store’s colorful book mural.

http://www.macon.com/news/local/news-columns-blogs/ed-grisamore/article117099073.html

 

Middle Georgia CEO features Shane Gottwals

Shane Gottwals talks about the growing pains of starting a new business.

http://middlegeorgiaceo.com/video/2016/11/shane-gottwals-starting-his-own-business-and-growing-pains/?utm_source=Middle+Georgia+CEO&utm_campaign=ca87a541cd-valdostaceo-daily_newsletter&utm_medium=email&utm_term=0_93bc236b54-ca87a541cd-303747065

 

New Books

Looking for Christmas gifts? Come in and explore our new book section for recently released or popular titles. Besides having tons of new releases in stock, you can’t beat our prices (even compared to the internet!).  Plus, you can return our books for 50% of the sticker price.  A discount + a return guarantee… now, that’s a great deal!

 

Toy Gift Ideas

Our wide selection of toys and educational products are great for holiday gifts. A classic favorite is the metal shopping cart and we also have sticker pads, stacking blocks, hot dog carts, plushes, and so much more!
